attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the cost of living increases the number of £5 notes in circulation becomes increasingly inadequate.  We understand that the £5 note is most frequently replaced due to the large amount of use it receives.

We would like to ask the Prime Minister to consider introducing a £5 coin, to make this denomination more widely available and reduce the resources required to replace £5 notes.

We look forwards to a future with less jangly pockets.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
